channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Black Bin Spillage, 17th January
item.description:
The smell is foul and we have had our black bins collected already but this resident has put it besides the bin. I asked the bin men and they said they do not collect things not in the bins.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wickham Lane, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Fly tipping and rubbish, 17th January
item.description:
The whole or Ravensdale Road has been full of rubbish for more than 6 weeks! Families throwing their supermarket boxes and bags of rubbish in street. People fly tipping all the time and place of worship at end of road have a constant sea of coffee cups!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priestley Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge area of road where top surface has been removed, 17th January
item.description:
This is outside the Co OP. It is the worst area of road in Lambeth. It is just getting bigger. Hopefully some of the money the government has given you can be used to repair this eyesore on a main road. On one side of this area there are at l;east 5 signifiocant potholes that have developed recently as old repair work falls apart.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 207, Coldharbour Lane, Loughborough Junction, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes in centre of road, 17th January
item.description:
5 potholes have developed in the middle of the road by the junction of Coldharbour L:ane with Padfield Road. I cxan only attach 3 photos for thsi report - there are more next to these. Theswe potholes are caused by old repairs falling apart.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 201, Coldharbour Lane, Loughborough Junction, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
